Download

Get latest source archive,
mktoc-1.1.2.tar.gz, or install with:

easy_install mktoc

Found a Bug?

Fill out a report on the issue tracker.

Quick search

Install StepsÂ¶

  1. Any one of the following command will install Mktoc. Make sure to run as root user:

    1. Use easy_install from the setuptools package:

      sudo easy_install mktoc

    2. Download the source distribution file and install from the command line:

      tar xzf mktoc-*.tar.gz
cd mktoc-*
sudo make install

  2. View online docs or README.txt for usage instructions.
